# vLLM Batch Server Documentation

> Production-ready OpenAI-compatible batch inference for local LLMs
> Process 50,000+ requests on consumer GPUs with automatic model hot-swapping

## Quick Start

- [5-Minute Quick Start](docs/quick-start/5-minute-quickstart.md): Get running in 5 minutes with Docker
- [Getting Started Guide](docs/guides/getting-started.md): Complete installation and setup

## Core Concepts

- [Architecture Overview](docs/architecture/ARCHITECTURE.md): How the system works
- [API Reference](docs/reference/api.md): Complete API documentation
- [Batch Processing](docs/guides/batch-processing.md): Submit and manage batch jobs
- [Model Management](docs/guides/model-management.md): Install and configure models

## Features

- [Label Studio Integration](docs/guides/label-studio.md): Data labeling and curation
- [Webhooks](docs/reference/webhooks.md): Event-driven automation
- [Benchmarking](docs/guides/benchmarking.md): Compare models scientifically
- [Monitoring](docs/guides/monitoring.md): Grafana, Prometheus, Loki setup

## Integration Guides

- [FastAPI Integration](docs/guides/integrations/fastapi.md): Use with FastAPI apps
- [Django Integration](docs/guides/integrations/django.md): Use with Django apps
- [Flask Integration](docs/guides/integrations/flask.md): Use with Flask apps
- [Next.js Integration](docs/guides/integrations/nextjs.md): Use with Next.js apps

## Deployment

- [Docker Deployment](docs/guides/deployment.md): Deploy with Docker Compose
- [Production Setup](docs/guides/production.md): Production best practices
- [GCP Secrets](docs/guides/gcp-secrets.md): Manage secrets in GCP

## Reference

- [API Endpoints](docs/reference/api.md): All endpoints and parameters
- [Webhook Events](docs/reference/webhooks.md): Event types and payloads
- [CLI Commands](docs/reference/cli.md): Command-line interface
- [Environment Variables](docs/reference/environment.md): Configuration options

## Troubleshooting

- [Common Issues](docs/TROUBLESHOOTING.md): Debug common problems
- [FAQ](docs/FAQ.md): Frequently asked questions

## Community
